items.title: 4 Retail Home Furnishing Stocks to Watch in a Thriving Industry
items.description: A focus on digitization, e-commerce, product innovation and new marketing techniques is encouraging for the Zacks Retail-Home Furnishing industry players like HD, WSM, FND and TPX.
